name: ALPHA CENTAURI SPACE FORCE (ocasocreations)
description:
Execute intense space battle operations from side, and top view. Face tough enemies along your way, destroy guardians and generators. Dodge traps. Keep focus on targets. Think fast. Overcome the chaos. Join now and become an alpha centauri pilot. Bonus: retro like endless space shooter mini game.

When pilots enlist in ALPHA CENTAURI SPACE FORCE, it’s not about to win a space war with a long single journey ticket. Pilots must excel in a new way in order to prevent any imminent threat.

Plot

The story takes place in Centaurus constellation, where a dangerous organized group of different aliens known as CYEBB is growing stronger, putting at risk the foundation established by gaians in Alpha Centauri the triple solar system. ALPHA CENTAURI SPACE FORCE, a military organization formed on the Earth planet maintains the objective to protect the gaian foundation, by deploying its best resources.

Features
  • Play four unique operations in different scenarios.
  • Drive different spacecraft with unique tech.
  • The Spacecraft are designed for the less and the most experienced pilots.
  • Switch between direct fire and lock-on system.
  • Overtime auto-upgrade system.
  • The SE shield prevents spacecraft from instant destruction.
  • Male and female pilot voices to choose from.
  • Displayable npc assistant officer will guide pilots along missions.
  • Rank and score system based on honor points, medals, ranks and emblems.
  • Fight against intense enemies.
  • Bonus: retro like endless space shooter mini game.
  • Fast-moving electronic music that keeps the energy and the pace up.

 MINIMUM SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS

    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: windows 10 64-bit
    • Processor: i3 3.50GHz Intel / AMD Ryzen 5 2400g
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Evga 960 GTX / RX Vega 11 graphics
    • Storage: 1 GB available space
